name: Deck of Many Horses
description:
When your party needs a mount, they need a mount immediately. Times like these are the perfect time to draw a card from the Deck of Many Horses. Drawing a card will always give you a mount, though its attributes and usefulness may vary with the whims of fate.

Inspired by Deck of Many Aces

Prompt from Piers42

Page icon created by combining:

Horse icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Ace icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
